Castle Doombad Classic

Trap-laying castle defense with Saturday-morning-cartoon vibes.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Classic campaign levels; short-session friendly.
  • Controller required: No
  • Local co-op: No
  • Simple controls; no controller required.
  • Great for parked, bite-sized play.

Where to buy / play at home

  • GOG
  • Humble Store
  • Amazon (Switch / eShop code)
  • Steam
PlatformAvailableKey perks / differences
Tesla Yes Simple controls; no controller required., Great for parked, bite-sized play.
PC Yes Full campaign with quality-of-life options
Xbox No —
PlayStation No —
Switch No —
Mobile Yes iOS/Android versions; touch-first UI

Cross-saves

  • Tesla → home export supported: No
  • No Tesla → home export.
  • Mobile versions sync via platform accounts.

Features

  • Local co-op: No
  • Online co-op (native): No
  • Controller recommended: No

Notes

  • If you prefer touch-like input, mobile is a comfy alternative at home.
